"@Miyo":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547f7f1c6368724f35970000#post_547f7f1c6368724f35970000
I'm terrifyed to death of birds.
Snakes, spiders, scorpians, mice, rats, and all other manner of creepy crawlies I'm fine with. Hell I routinely move copperheads out of the road so they don't get run over. But you put me in the same room with a parakeet?
